post:
# Introducing: Instant Deploy Dedicated Servers

### Pre-configured servers for rapid deployment - Delivered in 10-30 minutes

If you're the type of person who doesn't like to wait - this new product line is for you!

Currently, the stock is limited, and we're only offering two server configurations, however more will be added in the future.


> * [INS-1270-8](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=328 "**INS-1270-8**") | E3-1270 - 8GB RAM - 1TB HDD | $59/mo
> * [INS-1270-16](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=329 "I**NS-1270-16**") | E3-1270 - 16GB RAM - 1TB HDD | $69/mo

Product Group Link: https://sprsrv.cc/instantdedi
 
**All Instant Deploy Servers Include:** 
* 10 TB Premium Bandwidth (May be upgraded)
* 1 Gbps Port Speed
* /30 IPv4 Subnet (May be upgraded)
* /64 IPv6 Subnet
 
***Currently we are only offering Instant Deploy Servers in our Phoenix data center location***
